com.javasbar.smart.framework.lib.web

Interface IAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebActions

    public interface IAction
    Author:
    Basavaraj M This is the interface that should be implemented by the class/library that provides interactions with browser/application under test.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Navigates to back page

      Clicks on element

      To be used when there are multiple occurrences of an element.

      • clickElementNth

        void clickElementNth(String page,
                   String element,
                   int n)
        To be used when there are multiple occurrences of an element.
        Example: There are 10 checkboxes with same locator expression, and 5th one needs to be clicked.
        Pass 'page', 'checkBoxElement', 5.
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        n - n > 0

        Returns:

      • isElementVisible

        boolean isElementVisible(String page,
                       String element)
        Verifies the element is present and visible. Visibility is checked based on CSS properties visibility, opacity, display and also elements location wrt to window location is considered.
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -

      • getText

        String getText(String page,
             String element,
             boolean fail)
        Gets text of the element located by page>element
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        fail - - if true, then calling testcase will be failed if text could not be read. Else, null will be returned without failing calling test case.

      • getAttributesValues

        List<HashMap<String,String>> getAttributesValues(String page,
                                               String element,
                                               List<String> attributesList)
        Gets values of the attributesList for all/a element/s located by page->element
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        attribute -
        Returns:
        - returns list of maps containing all values of attributesList keys, for all found elements located.

      • getAttributeValue

        String getAttributeValue(String page,
                       String element,
                       String attribute,
                       int elementIndex)
        Returns attribute's value for the element located by page->element, 'elementIndex'th element is considered if there are many elements located by same locator. If a single element is expected to be located, send elementIndex=0
        Parameters:
        page - - "SRP"
        element - - "pivotBarAllLinks"
        attribute - - example: href, data-bak,..
        elementIndex - - >= 0

        element -
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • clickElementMatchingAttribValue

        void clickElementMatchingAttribValue(String page,
                                   String element,
                                   String attribute,
                                   String value)
        To be used when page->element points to a list of elements, and specific element to be clicked could be identified by an attribute's value.
        If index of the specific element is known, then clickElementNth could be used.
        Parameters:
        page -
        element -
        attribute -
        value -
